page.title: 19WETHERBY CUSTODY CENTRE
page.content:
{ The Youth Custody Centre}is for people aged between 18-21. The people there are those who find it difficult to cope with social pressures. The boys stay between 9 months and 4 years. How long they stay depends on their crime. They are there to try and get rid of their bad habits. When they stay there they learn skills such as woodwork, gardening etc. If they work very hard they can earn as much as five pounds a week. Although some work very hard they have very little chance of a job when they leave.
Before it was the Youth Custody Centre it was a{borstal}and before that it belonged to the{Royal Navy. The site will change into a{secure {youth custody unit}during the next few years.
